chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall x y : R, (forall eps : posreal, Rabs (x - y) < eps) -> x = y

Premises:
Record posreal : Set := mkposreal { pos : R; cond_pos : 0 < pos } For mkposreal: Argument scopes are [R_scope _]
Rabs = fun r : R => if Rcase_abs r then - r else r : R -> R Argument scope is [R_scope]
*** [ R : Set ]
cond_eq : forall x y : R, (forall eps : R, 0 < eps -> Rabs (x - y) < eps) -> x = y
uniform_continuity = fun (f : R -> R) (X : R -> Prop) => forall eps : posreal, exists delta : posreal, forall x y : R, X x -> X y -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps : (R -> R) -> (R -> Prop) -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope]
Heine_cor2 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps}
Heine_cor1 : forall (f : R -> R) (a b : R), a < b -> (forall x : R, a <= x <= b -> continuity_pt f x) -> forall eps : posreal, {delta : posreal | delta <= b - a /\ (forall x y : R, a <= x <= b -> a <= y <= b -> Rabs (x - y) < delta -> Rabs (f x - f y) < eps)}
Rabs_mult : forall x y : R, Rabs (x * y) = Rabs x * Rabs y
R_dist = fun x y : R => Rabs (x - y) : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
CVU = fun (fn : nat -> R -> R) (f : R -> R) (x : R) (r : posreal) => forall eps : R, 0 < eps -> exists N : nat, forall (n : nat) (y : R), (N <= n)%nat -> Boule x r y -> Rabs (f y - fn n y) < eps : (nat -> R -> R) -> (R -> R) -> R -> posreal -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope function_scope R_scope _]
maj_term3 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f2d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f2d -> Rabs ((f2 (x + h0) - f2 x) / h0 - l2) < Rabs ((f2 x)² * eps / (8 * f1 x))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 ->...-> Rabs (f1 x / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * ((f2 (x + h) - f2 x) / h - l2)) < eps / 4
maj_term4 : forall (x h eps l2 alp_f2 alp_f2c : R) (eps_f2 : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < alp_f2c -> Rabs (f2 (x + a) - f2 x) < Rabs ((f2 x)² * f2 x * eps / (8 * f1 x * l2))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2c ->...-> Rabs (l2 * f1 x / ((f2 x)² * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 (x + h) - f2 x)) < eps / 4
derivable_pt_lim = fun (f : R -> R) (x l : R) => forall eps : R, 0 < eps -> exists delta : posreal, forall h : R, h <> 0 -> Rabs h < delta -> Rabs ((f (x + h) - f x) / h - l) < eps : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [Rfun_scope R_scope _]
maj_term2 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 alp_f2t2 : R) (eps_f2 : posreal) (f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < alp_f2t2 -> Rabs (f2 (x + a) - f2 x) < Rabs (eps * (f2 x)² / (8 * l1))) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f2t2 -> Rabs h < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> l1 <> 0 -> Rabs (l1 / (f2 x * f2 (x + h)) * (f2 x - f2 (x + h))) < eps / 4
maj_term1 : forall (x h eps l1 alp_f2 : R) (eps_f2 alp_f1d : posreal) (f1 f2 : R -> R), 0 < eps -> f2 x <> 0 -> f2 (x + h) <> 0 -> (forall h0 : R, h0 <> 0 -> Rabs h0 < alp_f1d -> Rabs ((f1 (x + h0) - f1 x) / h0 - l1) < Rabs (eps * f2 x / 8)) -> (forall a : R, Rabs a < Rmin eps_f2 alp_f2 -> / Rabs (f2 (x + a)) < 2 / Rabs (f2 x)) -> h <> 0 -> Rabs h < alp_f1d ->...-> Rabs (/ f2 (x + h) * ((f1 (x + h) - f1 x) / h - l1)) < eps / 4
Datan_seq_increasing : forall (x y : R) (n : nat), (n > 0)%nat -> 0 <= x < y -> Datan_seq x n < Datan_seq y n
boule_of_interval : forall x y : R, x < y -> {c : R & {r : posreal | c - r = x /\ c + r = y}}
OmegaLemmas.fast_Zopp_plus_distr : forall (x y : Z) (P : Z -> Prop), P (- x + - y)%Z -> P (- (x + y))%Z
boule_in_interval : forall x y z : R, x < z < y -> {c : R & {r : posreal | Boule c r z /\ x < c - r /\ c + r < y}}
Record Metric_Space : Type := Build_Metric_Space { Base : Type; dist : Base -> Base -> R; dist_pos : forall x y : Base, dist x y >= 0; dist_sym : forall x y : Base, dist x y = dist y x; dist_refl : forall x y : Base, dist x y = 0 < -> x = y; dist_tri : forall x y z : Base, dist x y <= dist x z + dist z y } For Build_Metric_Space: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope function_scope]
Rmin_r : forall x y : R, Rmin x y <= y
Rabs_def1 : forall x a : R, x < a -> - a < x -> Rabs x < a
Rmin_l : forall x y : R, Rmin x y <= x
continuous_neq_0 : forall (f : R -> R) (x0 : R), continuity_pt f x0 -> f x0 <> 0 -> exists eps : posreal, forall h : R, Rabs h < eps -> f (x0 + h) <> 0
Rabs_def2 : forall x a : R, Rabs x < a -> x < a /\ - a < x
Rmin = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then x else y : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Rmax = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then y else x : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Riemann_integrable = fun (f : R -> R) (a b : R) => forall eps : posreal, {phi : StepFun a b & {psi : StepFun a b | (forall t : R, Rmin a b <= t <= Rmax a b -> Rabs (f t - phi t) <= psi t) /\ Rabs (RiemannInt_SF psi) < eps}} : (R -> R) -> R -> R -> Type Argument scopes are [function_scope R_scope R_scope]

```coq
intros x y H.
apply cond_eq.
intros eps Heps.
specialize (H eps Heps).
apply H.
Qed.
```

original: intros x y H. apply cond_eq. intros eps Heps. specialize (H eps Heps). apply H.
